content.question: In Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, a satellite of mass <math alttext="lowercase m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from the center of an asteroid of mass <math alttext="uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math>.
